description:
The falketind warm1 stretch Jacket is a versatile, lightweight fleece and the thinnest mid-layer in our light mountaineering range.

This soft pill and snag resistant jacket is made of durable recycled polyester fabric with superb stretch to ensure extra comfort. The fabric has a good warm-to-weight ratio and moisture transportation, making it a smart choice if you want to level up the intensity.

Features include a snug fit collar and elasticated cuffs with thumb holes which will elegantly go unseen when not in use.

It’s perfect as a summer mid-layer or as a versatile layering piece for the warmblooded all year.
name: Norrona Falketind Warm1 Stretch Jacket - Mens
